column1: %product_bundle_sku% was added to the whitelist with the following products %product_for_bundle_skus%.
column2: %product_bundle_sku% foi adicionado à lista de permissões com os seguintes produtos %product_for_bundle_skus%.

column1: %product_bundle_sku% was blacklisted because %product_for_bundle_skus% had been blacklisted
column2: %product_bundle_sku% foi adicionado à lista negra porque %product_for_bundle_skus% tinha sido adicionado à lista negra.
